line: Welcome to the world of Pokémon!
Would you like a tutorial on how to play?
You will first be assigned a set of 6 Pokémon to battle with.
The levels of your Pokémon are random and will reflect their respective stats.
If you don't like your current team, you can 're-roll' to get another 6.
The enemy will also have a team of 6 Pokémon with similar levels to yours.
You can choose to battle with any of your Pokémon, or you can switch them out for other Pokémon in your team.
You can also use items to heal your Pokémon or boost their stats.
You can click on the buttons to select an action.
Keep in mind that some attacks are stronger on certain types of Pokémon.
Your goal is to defeat all of the enemy's Pokémon.
